title: E-GROCERY order created successfully
template: Dear ${userName}! Your order has been successfully created and now is in processing.

title: E-GROCERY order processed
template: Dear ${userName}! Your order has been processed successfully! Wait for the shipment on dates: [${shipmentFrom}] -- [${shipmentTo}]

title: E-GROCERY order failed
template: Dear ${userName}! Processing of your order has failed. Please, see details on our web-site.
